long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ei mấy cốt!
Nếu đang bội thực thông tin, ngán ngẩm với tin tức thế sự, chán chường với những khuôn mặt đi đâu cũng thấy, hoặc đơn giản là đang rảnh, ngứa tay, ngứa chân thì…

…mời mấy cốt cắm thử plug-in này vào trình duyệt mở rộng để biến nơi lướt web mỗi ngày thành thế giới ngầm! Thế chỗ những nội dung thường ngày bằng hình ảnh, tin nóng, câu chuyện, deal hời chỉ có lúc nửa đêm!
Cắm thử, nếu xịn thì mình hô lên, rủ mấy cốt khác vô chơi!


_______________


Bitis Hunter Midnight is an innovative Chrome extension designed to enhance your web browsing experience by dynamically updating images and hyperlinks on web pages. Perfect for users who enjoy a refreshing and visually stimulating browsing experience, this extension adds an element of surprise and novelty to your daily internet exploration.

Key Features:

Image Swapper: Automatically updates images on websites with a curated selection from our gallery, providing a fresh visual experience.
Link Randomizer: Transforms regular hyperlinks into gateways to exciting and unexpected destinations, offering new discoveries with every click.
Periodic Updates: Continuously refreshes content, ensuring that every moment on the web is unique and engaging.
Selective Activation: Smartly avoids specified websites, ensuring that the extension only enhances the sites where you desire a dynamic experience.
Why Bitis Hunter Midnight?

Innovative Browsing: Experience the web like never before – constantly changing and ever-surprising.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple to install and effortless to use, designed for both casual and power users.
Customizable Settings: Choose which websites to transform and how often, tailoring the experience to your preferences.
Perfect For:

Users seeking a unique and dynamic browsing experience.
Those who enjoy random discoveries and visual changes on familiar websites.
Privacy and Security:
Your privacy and security are our top priorities. Bitis Hunter Midnight operates locally on your browser, without storing or transmitting personal data.

Experience the Web in a Whole New Way:
Get ready to transform your browsing experience with Bitis Hunter Midnight. Install now and dive into a world where the web constantly evolves, keeping your online journey fresh and exciting!
